text: Rafael Paullier is an equestrian from Uruguay. Paullier competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born on 24 February 1932.Rafael Paullier == References == == Other websites == * Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Olympians for Uruguay Category:Show jumping riders Category:Sportspeople from Montevideo Category:Uruguayan equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians for Uruguay
title: Rafael Paullier
